items.title: UPS cutting 20,000 jobs amid reduction in Amazon shipments
items.description: UPS on Tuesday announced it is planning to cut 20,000 jobs as part of its plan for workforce consolidation.

items.description: The F/A-18E Super Hornet was being towed Monday when it and the tug slipped and were lost in the Red Sea, the Navy said.
